subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Lakers once said Kobe Bryant, who signed a two-year, $48.5 million extension, was worth $60 million a year, but that was predicated on the team’s being really good.
snippet: The Lakers once said Kobe Bryant, who signed a two-year, $48.5 million extension, was worth $60 million a year, but that was predicated on the team’s being really good.
